          java.io.IOException,
          javax.sound.sampled.LineUnavailableException
        Execute methods in the model to load the game.
        Throws:
        javax.sound.sampled.LineUnavailableException - A LineUnavailableException is an exception indicating that aline cannot be opened because it is unavailable. This situationarises most commonly when a requested line is already in useby another
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred. This class is the general class of exceptions produced by failed orinterrupted I/O operations
        javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException - means An UnsupportedAudioFileException is an exception indicating that an operation failed because a file did not contain valid data of a recognized filetype and format.
